text.text: BIP Bot is a slack bot providing a better way to implement the Bimodal Internal Process. At the very first MVP, BIP Bot will help us to schedule the PTO time.Read the <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ruRofzWX7pkLEdNZ9T7N71tEV6AL0zmx5DcLW2OSNb8/edit|*[BIP - leave management & attendance management]> for understanding requirements
